title: "Month", "year"
context: §1-20 &ldquo;Month&rdquo;, &ldquo;year&rdquo;. The word &ldquo;month&rdquo; means a calendar month; and the word &ldquo;year&rdquo;, a calendar year. [CC 1859, §18; RL 1925, §17; RL 1935, §18; RL 1945, §17; RL 1955, §1-25; HRS §1-20] Case Notes Cited: 10 H. 249, 250; 38 H. 443, 444.
